eu_initiatives: Activities at Community level for Youth in the field of Erasmus, in the immigration, in the combating fraud and counterfeiting and copy, and in the international cooperation with the countries extra UE and in the countries developing

goals__remit: The UNION OF EUROPEAN EXPERTS CHAMBERS - UCEE introduces itself as a high level International Non Governmental Organization (INGO) operating in EU and in non EU Countries that will have the chance to make their own experts be part of it in order to help solve economic, social, cultural and communication problems with an informal approach and consequently over the parts as much as possible. This fact in the attempt to accelerate the concertation and the research of a consensus necessary to formally and positively define issues of international importance. Additionally, they intend to constitute a roll of the European Experts in order to stress the experience of the people on it, enhancing the specialization they got through their professional activity, either as self-employed or as a subordinate employee. Under this strategy, UCEE have set themselves a goal: they intend to become a constant and qualified meeting point between supply and demand of services in the field of intellectual work.
relevant_communication:
Presentation in the 2014 of the project "EU objectives in the fight against fraud and counterfeiting and copying" at the European Parliament in Brussels -  
Presentation in the 2015 of the project “ AGRI-FOOD PROCESSING PROGRAM FOR WOMEN IN AFRICA “ at NGO CSW Forum Consultation Day, Apollo Theatre, 253 W 125th St, New York, NY 10027 -  
Presentation in the 2016 of the projects " EurAfrica 2 - New possibility of Business in the Kingdom of Morocco “ and of the Project: "SPORTELLO ITALIA - Investment opportunities in historic building " at the European Parliament in Brussels - Presentation in February 2017 in Florence of the International Conference organized by UCEE in partnership with the Regional Council of Tuscany "Construction in Tuscany and internationalization, opportunities from Brussels" and presentation in July 2017 in Brussels in the Assises de la Coopération Decentralisée /Regions and Cities for Development, the project “ Local Development in Guatemala - Pilot project aimed at improving territorial development in Guatemala “
